short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🎓 NJIT Extension: View RMP ratings, export your schedule as CSV, and sort professors by ratings. Save time, schedule smarter! 🚀

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎉 Easily Integrate RMP with NJIT Schedule Builder! 🎉

📚 Step 1: Pick your desired courses like a pro.

👀 Step 2: Hover over professors' names to instantly see their RMP ratings—without ever leaving the website!

💾 Step 3: Click the extension, hit "Export to CSV", and boom! Download your schedule data.

📊 Step 4: Toss that shiny CSV into Google Sheets or Excel like a champ.

✨ VOILA! Now you’ve got a spreadsheet where professors are sorted from best to meh based on ratings, all with just a few clicks!

💡 Fun Fact: This has been battle-tested and can save you hours of headache and tears.

🎯 Work smarter, not harder! 🙌

🖥️ Your schedule-building game = leveled up. 🚀
